00016 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC( CCommErrorDlg, CDialog )
00017 
00018 BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP( CCommErrorDlg, CDialog )
00019     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_ERROR_BTN_EXIT, OnBnClickedExit )
00020     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_ERROR_BTN_CHANGE_PORT, OnBnClickedChangeCom )
00021     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_ERROR_BTN_RETRY, OnBnClickedRetry )

00024 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 CCommErrorDlg::CCommErrorDlg
00035     (
00036     TCHAR               * aErrorMessage,
00037     BOOL                  aIsPortDown,
00038     CWnd                * aParent,
00039     FmiApplicationLayer & aCom
00040     )
00041     : CDialog( IDD_ERROR, aParent )
00042     , mMessageText( _T("") )
00043     , mCom( aCom )
00044 {
00045     mMessageText.Format( _T("%s"), aErrorMessage );
00046     mComPortDown = aIsPortDown;
00047 }

00054 }

00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 void CCommErrorDlg::DoDataExchange
00061     (
00062     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00063     )
00064 {
00065     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00066     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_ERROR_TXT_MESSAGE, mMessageText );
00067 }

00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 BOOL CCommErrorDlg::OnInitDialog()
00079 {
00080     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00081 
00082     if( mComPortDown )
00083     {
00084         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00085         GetDlgItem( IDC_ERROR_BTN_EXIT )->ShowWindow( SW_SHOW );
00086         GetDlgItem( IDC_ERROR_BTN_RETRY )->ShowWindow( SW_SHOW );
00087         GetDlgItem( IDC_ERROR_BTN_CHANGE_PORT )->ShowWindow( SW_SHOW );
00088     }
00089     return TRUE;
00090 } /* OnInitDialog() */

00092 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CCommErrorDlg::OnBnClickedExit()
00098 {
00099     AfxGetMainWnd()->SendMessage( WM_CLOSE );
00100     mComPortDown = FALSE;    //change so we can call OnCancel
00101     OnCancel();
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 void CCommErrorDlg::OnCancel()
00110 {
00111     if( !mComPortDown )
00112     {
00113         CDialog::OnCancel();
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 void CCommErrorDlg::OnBnClickedRetry()
00123 {
00124 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00125     mCom.sendEnable();
00126 #else
00127     mCom.clearError();
00128 #endif
00129 
00130     OnOK();
00131 }
00132 
00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void CCommErrorDlg::OnBnClickedChangeCom()
00139 {
00140     CSelectCommPortDlg dlg( this );
00141     if( IDOK == dlg.DoModal() )
00142     {
00143         OnBnClickedRetry();
00144     }
00145 }

00156 void CCommErrorDlg::PostNcDestroy()
00157 {
00158     Event::post( EVENT_COMM_ERROR_DLG_CLOSED );
00159     CDialog::PostNcDestroy();
